title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Associate Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Computer Science Engineering can apply for the IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details,...
